hero.subtitle: Authentic Sardinian cuisine in Prague
hero.description: Traditional Sardinian dishes, fine wines, fresh fish and seafood in the heart of Mala Strana

tradition.title: Sardinian Tradition
tradition.description: Authentic recipes passed down through generations. Two floors with a calm and intimate atmosphere to experience true Sardinian culinary tradition.

fish.title: Fresh Fish
fish.description: Daily selection of fresh fish, prepared according to Italian tradition. Ingredients imported directly from Sardinia.

wines.title: Unique Wines
wines.description: Diverse selection of Italian wines, including our own wine grown in Sardinia. Cannonau, Vermentino and local rarities.

specialDish.subtitle: Our Signature Dish
specialDish.title: Porceddu
specialDish.description: The king of Sardinian cuisine: suckling pig slowly roasted over myrtle wood, with crispy skin and tender meat that melts in your mouth. An authentic experience of Sardinia's pastoral tradition, served with roasted potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

bottega.subtitle: Authentic Products from Sardinia
bottega.title: The Bottega
bottega.description: Take a piece of Sardinia home. In our shop you'll find DOP cheeses, artisanal cured meats, fresh pasta, wines from the best Sardinian wineries and specialties you won't find anywhere else in Prague. Also perfect as gifts.

events.subtitle: Your event Sardinian style
events.title: Private Events
events.description: Celebrate birthdays, anniversaries or corporate dinners in our private room. Customized menus with the best Sardinian specialties, fine wines and an intimate, welcoming atmosphere in the heart of Mala Strana.

review1.quote: A corner of Sardinia in the heart of Prague. The culurgiones are identical to those I used to eat as a child in Ogliastra. Congratulations!
review1.author: Marco B.

review2.quote: Finally an authentic Italian restaurant in Prague. The porceddu is spectacular, the shop with Sardinian products is a gem. We will definitely be back.
review2.author: Lucia & Paolo

review3.quote: Intimate atmosphere, impeccable service and exceptional Sardinian wines. The Cannonau recommended by the staff was perfect with the lamb. Highly recommended!
review3.author: Jana K.
